version_description:
Big update!!! Now available for iPhones!!! (iPhones 5, 6 and higher)

• New game mode added - "Endless War". It unlocked after all quests are completed.
Stadium, Arena, Fort now enterable in this mode. Three new types of enemies added.
You need to replay last quest to enable this mode, even if you played it before.

• Added support for VR Headsets - Durovis Dive, Google Cardboard and similar.

• Added support for MFi, iCade gamepads (experimental).
For iCade gamepads, since iOS 8.1, system language must be set the same as gamepad language before playing the game.

• Many bugfixes and improvements.

• We are working on full version of the game, wait for new content!

• New game mode added - "Endless War". It unlocked after all quests are completed.
Stadium, Arena, Fort now enterable in this mode. Three new types of enemies added.
You need to replay last quest to enable this mode, even if you played it before.

• Added support for VR Headsets - Durovis Dive, Google Cardboard and similar.

• We are working on full version of the game, wait for new content!

• The game has been updated with scripts and features of Occupation 2.5
• And moved to new Unity engine version
• English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and Indonesian localizations
• New fixed camera controls
• Improved graphics, added camera effects

64 bit support. Enhancements, bug fixes.
Occupation 2 will appear soon:)

Version 2.1.1:
• Very good update!
• Rewritten core player scripts
• New player animations
• Ability to fight with arms, legs and lead pipe
• Many enhancements and bug fixes

Version 2.2 - Fight Camera fixed, "Exit Aim Mode" button added, crosshair hidden when autoaiming and other improvements.

Version 2.3 - Many enhancements and bug fixes. Now double tap on "Weapon/Inventory toggle" holsters/unholsters the current weapon. Other double taps: on "Crouch toggle" - drops weapon, on "Aiming toggle" - reloads weapon
